Citta Residences Hengfeng connects you to everywhere you want to go in life. With easy access to Metro Lines #1, #12, and #13, this remarkable location seamlessly links you to Shanghai’s multi-dimensional transportation system, so you can travel within the city’s vibrant core or venture to far-off locales.
